So said  Narendra S  on  2003-07-30 --------------------

>Hi,
>
>I would l=
ike to unit test JSP's. After going through junit.org I understand
>that JS=
P's can be tested either
>using cactus or HttpUnit. Can you advice me on wh=
ich tool should I go in
>for? What is the difference between these 2 tools?=


What about your JSPs do you want to test?

Also, don't forget HTMLUnit (c=
ompare with HTTPUnit) in your search for the right tool.

It's an important=
 question: what does it mean to "unit test" a JSP? To me, the key is to exe=
cute the JSP in isolation without any business logic -- simply throw object=
s into a Request and hit the JSP.

What do *you* want to test?

Take care.
=


J. B. Rainsberger,
